Description.Name: MechWarrior Strike
Description.Details:
As soon as Yang leaves the cockpit of the BattleMech and starts ordering the Astechs and Mechtechs to secure the gigantic war machines, you find yourself surrounded on the 'Mech Bay by all of the company's pilots, led by [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]]. 

"Commander, we have been informed that Kamea now wants to deal with the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAutocracyOfLeh],Autocracy]]'s forces on the planet." {TGT_MW.Callsign} points angrily at you. "We don't need to these petty vendettas and we stand ready to follow your legitimate orders."

{SCN_MW.Callsign} interrupts. "That's Captain Arano to you {TGT_MW.Callsign}. And it was time for a change of leadership after what happened with the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDeathsMask],Death's Mask]] virus and the Autocracy, no offense intended Commander. I stand ready to support her, as do other pilots and most of the support crew." Yang looks at you and shrugs in acceptance.

You turn to {TRT_MW.Callsign}. "What about you, {TRT_MW.Callsign}, where do you stand on this?"

"Ah Commander, I'm merely here for the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCBill],C-Bills]]. Doesn't matter who pays me, as long as we get paid, and the same happens with whomever is CO."  

{TRT_MW.Callsign} smirks at both {TGT_MW.Callsign} and {SCN_MW.Callsign}. "After all, we're all mercenaries, we don't get paid for any sort of politics. And if people are unsatisfied, they can always leave."

"You shut your damn mouth {TRT_MW.Callsign}! You have no principles!!"

"And you have, {TGT_MW.Callsign}? That's pretty funny considering how you're always stealing additional rations from the galley." The remark causes {SCN_MW.Callsign} to laugh while {TGT_MW.Callsign} glares angrily at both MechWarriors.

Description.Name: Follow {TRT_MW.Callsign}'s lead and don't take sides.
Day Off
Description.Details:
You intervene before the discussion gets out of hand and everyone listens to you silently. "{TGT_MW.Callsign} has a point: we took some contracts that we probably shouldn't have and suffered losses as a consequence. And we are also taking a huge risk by choosing to go to the other side of the law." {TGT_MW.Callsign} nods satisfed with your words. 

"And {SCN_MW.Callsign} is also right. Most of the crew chose Kamea to be the CO of this company. This wouldn't be allowed if we were back in the Inner Sphere or if we were a larger mercenary outfit, but out here it seems that democracy is well alive, even though this is not the proper way to run a military unit."

"So what are you saying, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}?" {TRT_MW.Callsign} looks at you curiously. "Are we dropping again on her orders or not?"

Before you answer, Darius taps you on the shoulder. "Commander, Captain Arano has announced that she'll drop on her own to deal with the Arauts and to prepare the DropShip."

"That solves it for now. Everyone not needed to prepare the DropShip is dismissed, in fact, you can take the day off. We'll see how our new Captain performs on her own, that should solve this issue."

Description.Name: MechWarrior Strike
Description.Details:
The discussion continues for several minutes until Darius arrives from the bridge. "Captain Arano has announced that she'll drop on her own to take care of the Arauts on the planet. Yang, get the BattleMechs ready."

"What?!" {TGT_MW.Callsign} and {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:his|Female:her|NonBinary:their} supporters look in disbelief. "Well, if the princess wants to commit suicide, let her. Like {SCN_MW.Callsign} said, everyone is free to jump out. I guess she's taking it literally."

"And until this matter is solved, we're on strike, we're not going to save her ass once the Autocracy gets medieval on it." The rest of the crew agrees and slowly the Mech Bay starts getting empty as everyone starts discussing Kamea's decision in groups of twos and threes.

Description.Name: {TGT_MW.Callsign} concedes.
Description.Details:
The discussion continues for several minutes until Darius arrives from the bridge. "Captain Arano has announced that she'll drop on her own to take care of the Arauts on the planet. Yang, get the BattleMechs ready."

{SCN_MW.Callsign} whistles. "Well, the Captain does have a pair of balls bigger than some MechWarriors in this company. It seems this solves the issue, {TGT_MW.Callsign} won't have to worry about soiling {TGT_MW.Gender?Male:his|Female:her|NonBinary:their} [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCoolingVest],Cooling Vest]].

{TGT_MW.Callsign} glares at {SCN_MW.Callsign} but you step by {SCN_MW.Gender?Male:his|Female:her|NonBinary:their} side, and {TGT_MW.Callsign} acknowledges defeat.

With the discussion over and everyone leaving the Mech Bay, you notice {SCN_MW.Callsign} throwing a playful rib punch at {TGT_MW.Callsign}, who replies in the same manner as both head towards their cabins.
